title: Bug 102623 - Image cannot be refreshed after reimporting
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the image is not being refreshed and the previously imported image remains visible.
OB: When importing new "image1.jpg" into the layout again, the original image remains displayed and the new image is not shown.
EB: The expected behavior is that after importing the new image, it should be displayed instead of the original image.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Import a new "image1.jpg" into the layout.

Expected behavior:
- The newly imported image should be displayed instead of the original image.

Actual observed behavior:
- The original image remains displayed and the newly imported image is not shown.
